alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 2:59PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Delta County through 330 PM MDT... At 259 PM MDT, meteorologist and satellite imagery was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Delta, or 21 miles northwest of Montrose, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orchard City. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 50 in Colorado between mile markers 62 and 76. Colorado 65 between mile markers 1 and 5. Colorado 92 between mile markers 1 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin
